quoted.text:
Google Nano Banana on Gemini App

Fashion photography has just gone bananas. DeepMind team has a very chic model. Take this JSON prompt and show your creativity.

{
Â  "prompt_title": "Effortless Chic Pose",
Â  "concept": "A hyperrealistic fashion photograph replicating a specific street style moment: a woman in a black knit set posing elegantly against a lamppost in a European city.",
Â  "scene_composition": {
Â  Â  "shot_type": "Medium full-body shot",
Â  Â  "camera_lens": "85mm f/1.4 lens",
Â  Â  "perspective": "Eye-level, capturing the subject from the side.",
Â  Â  "aspect_ratio": "2:3",
Â  Â  "focus": "Sharp focus on the woman and her outfit. The background is beautifully blurred with creamy bokeh to isolate the subject."
Â  },
Â  "environment": {
Â  Â  "setting": "A European city square or wide pedestrian street during the day.",
Â  Â  "background_details": "The background is softly blurred but shows classical architecture with light-colored stone buildings. A few indistinct figures are walking in the distance.",
Â  Â  "ground": "Light-colored stone pavers or cobblestones.",
Â  Â  "atmosphere": "Chic, relaxed, and sophisticated."
Â  },
Â  "subject": {
Â  Â  "primary": "A stylish young woman with long, wavy dark hair.",
Â  Â  "appearance": "Her hair falls naturally over her shoulder. She has a gentle, soft expression and is looking slightly away from the camera.",
Â  Â  "pose": "She is leaning with her back against a dark, ornate metal lamppost on the left side of the frame. Her right leg is bent and lifted behind her. "
Â  },
Â  "outfit_and_details": {
Â  Â  "top": "A form-fitting, sleeveless black top made of a visible ribbed knit fabric.",
Â  Â  "bottom": "A matching black mini skirt, also made of the same ribbed knit material.",
Â  Â "shoes": "black slingback high heel"
Â  },
Â  "style_and_aesthetics": {
Â  Â  "realism": "Hyperrealistic, photorealistic, cinematic, 8K resolution, ultra-detailed.",
Â  Â  "lighting": "Soft, diffused daylight, as if on an overcast day or in the shade, to prevent harsh shadows and create a flattering, even light on the subject.",
Â  Â  "color_palette": "A monochrome and muted palette. Dominant blacks from the outfit and lamppost, contrasted with the light tones of the buildings and ground.",
Â  Â  "details": "Emphasis on realistic material properties: the fine texture of the ribbed knit, the rough texture of the stone pavers, and the metallic finish of the lamppost."
Â  },
Â  "quality_boosters": [
Â  Â  "masterpiece",
Â  Â  "best quality",
Â  Â  "insanely detailed",
Â  Â  "sharp focus",
Â  Â  "professional fashion photography",
Â  Â  "street style",
Â  Â  "editorial",
Â  Â  "trending on Vogue"
Â  ],
Â  "negative_prompt": [
Â  Â  "cartoon, anime, 3D render, illustration, painting",
Â  Â  "blurry, out of focus, low quality, jpeg artifacts",
Â  Â  "harsh sunlight, strong shadows",
Â  Â  "crowded street, distracting background",
Â  Â  "deformed anatomy, bad hands, extra limbs",
Â  Â  "text, watermark, signature"
Â  ]
}
